Articles.Content:
I've installed a couple of mod's, all updated to 1.04 tough it keep telling me that infernal robotics are for 1.02 even tough at curse it says it's for 1.04 (see screenshot) after I installed those I don't have any contracts or no new contracts are showing up in the contracts building, why is that? and is there somehow a way to get them working again and keep my mods
